data.label:
Narrator

After the makeup crew brushed various powders on my face, I reviewed my notes briefly. It was a big day.

Narrator

I was seated at the room's center, behind a grand, antique desk of dark mahogany, its surface cleared except for a single, neatly arranged stack of papers.

Narrator

I entered the grand reception hall to make my address to the nation speech.

Player_Romus

"As it's tradition, just like my beloved father and the monarchs before him, I am doing this broadcast to you the people of Rizia."

Player_Romus

"Today, there is much to celebrate, to look back and feel proud of ourselves."

Player_Romus

"We have finally crushed the rogue government in Pales and ensured that the Grand Duchy will no longer be a problem."

Player_Romus

"So, let's use this moment to honor and remember all who died on this journey. We must never forget their sacrifice."

Player_Romus

"So, let us now look to the future with the peace we established."

Player_Romus

"I am proud to have secured peace with Pales. Now that the war is over, we will look towards building a better future."

Player_Romus

"I salute every men and women who have served their duties for the Kingdom and contributed to this war."

Player_Romus

"However, there are also sad developments that have recently occurred. Rizia was forced to surrender against our war with the Grand Duchy of Pales."

Player_Romus

"Now, I want to talk about some accomplishments that have occurred during my reign."

Player_Romus

"But most importantly, we brought reform to our kingdom."

Player_Romus

"On top of our successes abroad, we also accomplished much inside our political system."

Player_Romus

"Now I want to talk about one of the biggest of our achievements, which was the declaration of the Rizian Charter of Fundamental Law."

Player_Romus

"I want to congratulate our parliament in drafting the new constitution. Together, we brought historic reforms to our kingdom."

Player_Romus

"By enshrining the separation of powers in a written charter, we have accomplished much inside our political system."

Player_Romus

"One of the biggest of our achievements was the declaration of the Rizian Charter of Fundamental Law."

Narrator

I took a deep breath.

Player_Romus

"First of all, I want to remind you about our new alliance and the future of Southern Merkopa."

Player_Romus

"Today, we must celebrate what we have accomplished with our neighbors."

Player_Romus

"I also want to highlight one of my regime's biggest achievements, which was the declaration of the Intermerkopum Alliance."

Player_Romus

"But that's not all. With the establishment of Intermerkopum, the future of Southern Merkopa is in our hands."

Player_Romus

"We also recently announced our new alliance: Intermerkopum."

Player_Romus

"I also want to highlight another achievement of ours. The declaration of the Intermerkopum alliance."

Player_Romus

"With both Pales and Zille reunited back with the kingdom, we turned back the wheels of time."

Player_Romus

"And with that, the Rizian peninsula is now completely united under Rizia, once again!"

Player_Romus

"With the new constitution, we established a new system of democracy, by giving the House of Delegates the law-making power."

Player_Romus

"In accordance with the new laws, Rizian laws will be governed solely by the Rizian legislative, which is then governed by a head of government, the Rizian people will soon get a chance to elect."

Player_Romus

"Therefore I'd like to take this moment to congratulate the marriage between Vina Toras and Axel Reinhart."

Player_Romus

"Glovurius axa Rizia, axa Pales!"

Player_Romus

"I stand here with a heavy heart, knowing that we couldn't achieve peace in Pales yet. But we must not falter, it is our duty as Rizians to protect our kingdom and to support our brave soldiers who are giving their lives for our safety."

Player_Romus

"I promise the Rizian people a swift and complete victory of Rizia and ask for your patience."

Player_Romus

"As a founding member of this alliance, Rizia will set the pace for the future of our region."

Player

"By securing valuable international deals, we brought foreign investment and greatly increased our economic prosperity."

Player_Romus

"We will stand together with our allies against any attempts to intervene in our region by the ATO, the CSP or anyone else."

Player_Romus

"This organization will bring prosperity to all of South Merkopa. In the future, I expect other Merkopan nations to join it."

Player_Romus

"Zille, the heartland that has long pulsed with the spirit of Rizia despite the shadows that fell upon it, is once again where it truly belongs."

Player_Romus

"This is not merely the reclamation of land, but the restoration of our heritage, the reunion of our families, and the rekindling of our hope."

Player_Romus

"As we celebrate this historic reunion, let us also extend a hand of friendship and gratitude towards all who have supported our journey towards peace. "

Player_Romus

"In the realm of commerce, we have forged new trade deals that have opened new horizons for our products, bringing Rizian craftsmanship and ingenuity to the global stage."

Player_Romus

"From the revitalization of our traditional crafts to the birth of cutting-edge technological sectors, we ignited a renaissance in industries old and new."

Player_Romus

"Our kingdom still is completely self-sufficient and stands strong."

Player_Romus

"Our stewardship of the national budget has been guided by principles of responsibility and foresight, ensuring that our resources are allocated not just for our immediate needs, but for the prosperity of future generations."

Player_Romus

"Our stewardship of our economy has been guided by principles of responsibility and self-sufficiency, ensuring that our resources are allocated not just for our immediate needs, but for the prosperity of future generations."

Player_Romus

"Our journey has been marked by significant milestones and transformative changes that have shaped the destiny of Rizia."

Player_Romus

"In our commitment to the well-being and dignity of every worker, we have enacted reforms that ensure fairer wages, safer working conditions, and a voice in the shaping of their futures."

Player_Romus

"By embracing diversity in belief and worship, we have cultivated a culture of mutual respect and understanding, a testament to the idea that our differences are not a source of division, but our greatest strength."

Player_Romus

"In a bold stride towards a future defined by freedom and unity, we have taken the step to separate the spiritual from the state, affirming that no single creed should stand as the sole pillar of our national identity. "

Player_Romus

"In pursuit of a Rizia that would soar to the heavens, we have also sought to weave the moral and ethical teachings of our diverse religious traditions into the fabric of our legal system."

Narrator

After the makeup crew brushed various powders on my face, I reviewed my notes briefly. I would soon announce my abdication.

Player_Romus

"The scepters are our weapons, the altars are our forts. Sanctuaries are our barracks, the faithful are our soldiers. God's army has awakened, the Golconda awaits."

Player_Romus

"The true measure of our progress is found in the living standards of our people. We have made remarkable strides in increasing our nation's welfare, laying the foundation for a society that not only survives but thrives."

Player_Romus

"The true measure of our progress is found in the living standards of our people. We have made strides in increasing the welfare of commoners, and I expect their situation to only improve going forward."

Player_Romus

"Our transportation infrastructure has seen unprecedented growth and modernization, connecting every corner of our kingdom with roads, railways, and bridges that are the arteries of commerce and community."

Player_Romus

"I made significant investments into our expansive transportation network, which has not only facilitated easier movement of goods and people within our borders but has also reinforced our ties with neighboring nations,

Player_Romus

"Our kingdom's natural beauty, rich history, and vibrant culture have captivated the hearts of people from across the globe, transforming Rizia into a cherished destination for travelers seeking adventure and enlightenment."

Player_Romus

"Our booming tourism industry not only brings the world to our doorstep but also weaves our stories and traditions into global heritage."

Player_Romus

"I am proud of the new energy infrastructure we have created. We have brought power to countless homes and businesses both here and abroad."

Player_Romus

"Our commitment to global stability and the bonds of friendship have led us to stand with Vendonesam during their time of strife. Our successful military operations in support of their government have helped to restore order and peace."

Player_Romus

"It is important to let go and allow new leadership to take the reigns."

Player_Romus

"My beloved people of Rizia, as we stand at the crossroads of history, reflecting on the journey behind us and gazing into the promise of tomorrow, we are reminded of the enduring strength and resilience that define us."

Player_Romus

"As your monarch, I am humbled by the trust you have placed in me, and I stand before you not just as a leader, but as a fellow citizen, committed to the stewardship of our shared destiny."

Player_Romus

"However, even a monarch's hands are tied sometimes. That brings me to an important announcement I will make."

Player_Romus

"Yet, every season has its time, and every chapter must give way to the next, for it is in the turning of pages that a story finds its depth and meaning."

Player_Romus

"The road ahead is filled with both promise and peril, but I assure you..."

Player_Romus

"To you, the people of Rizia, I promise you..."

Player_Romus

"In the chapters yet unwritten, I pledge to you..."

Player_Romus

"I will safeguard our natural bounty and cherish our cultural heritage, passing on to our children a glorious kingdom."

Player_Romus

"I will commit to innovation and excellence in science, in art, in every field of endeavor, making Rizia a luminary on the global stage."

Player_Romus

"The pillars of education and healthcare will be strengthened, guaranteeing that every Rizian has the knowledge to dream and the health to pursue those dreams."

Player_Romus

"I will uphold peace and security, both within our borders and in our relations with the world."

Player_Romus

"But today, I stand here with the knowledge that I had done everything I could for this kingdom as a monarch. And I stand here as one of you."

Player_Romus

"It is with a heart heavy with emotion yet buoyant with hope for our future that I announce my decision to abdicate the throne of Rizia."

Player_Romus

"I will be abdicating the throne of Rizia for personal reasons."

Narrator

I took a deep breath.

Player_Romus

"In this moment of transition, I am comforted and elated to affirm that the crown will pass to a most worthy and capable successor, Princess Vina. Her dedication to our people and her visionary outlook for the future of Rizia make her the ideal steward of our nation's legacy and promise."

Player_Romus

"I have every confidence that under Princess Vina's reign, Rizia will continue to flourish, navigating the complexities of the modern world with grace and fortitude."

Player_Romus

"In closing, I offer my deepest gratitude for the privilege of serving as your king. The challenges we have surmounted together, and the dreams we have nurtured will forever remain with me."

Player_Romus

"As I step into a new role, my commitment to Rizia and its people remains unshaken, bound by a love for our land that is as eternal as the stars under which it rests."

Player_Romus

In this moment of transition, I am comforted and elated to affirm that the crown will pass to a most worthy and capable successor, Hugo Toras. His dedication to our people and his acute understanding of the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead, make him the ideal steward of our nation's legacy and promise."

Player_Romus

"I call upon each of you, the heart and soul of Rizia, to extend to Hugo Toras the same support, loyalty, and love that you have so generously bestowed upon me."

Player_Romus

"Together, under his leadership, we will embark on a new era of promise and potential, continuing to build a Rizia that shines as a beacon of hope, prosperity, and peace."

Player_Romus

"I call upon each of you, the heart and soul of Rizia, to extend to Ricardus Toras the same support, loyalty, and love that you have so generously bestowed upon me."

Player_Romus

"In this moment of transition, I am comforted and elated to affirm that the crown will pass to a most worthy and capable successor, Hubertus Toras. His dedication to our people and his acute understanding of the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead, make him the ideal steward of our nation's legacy and promise."

Player_Romus

"Long live Rizia, and may the reign of Queen Vina usher in a new dawn of glory and achievement for our cherished kingdom."

Player_Romus

"Long live Rizia, and may the reign of King Hugo usher in a new dawn of glory and achievement for our cherished kingdom."

Player_Romus

"Glovurius axa Rizia!"

Player_Romus

"As I stand before you, I do not merely stand as your king; I stand as the embodiment of Rizia's past, present, and future."

Player_Romus

"Let it be known that my resolve remains unshakeable, and our kingdom invincible under the banner of House Toras."

Player_Romus

"With the authority vested in me by the Divine, I decree the continuation of our Kingdom of God, ensuring that the God's laws remain the pinnacle of justice and decision-making in Rizia."

Player_Romus

"Let us bow our heads in reverence to the divine providence that has shepherded our great nation to this moment of reflection and renewal. Our path forward is illuminated by the eternal light of faith, our policies and endeavors sanctified by our unwavering devotion to the divine will."

Player_Romus

"In recognizing the indomitable voice of our citizens, I will continue to commit to the reformation of our monarchy and the advancement of our democracy."

Player_Romus

"Together, under this new covenant of monarchy and democracy, we shall write a new chapter in the annals of Rizia, crafting a legacy of unity, progress, and shared destiny."

Player_Romus

"As I stand before you, I no longer stand as an absolute monarch; I merely stand as the symbol of Rizia's past, and the protector of its constitution."

Player_Romus

"Together, under my leadership, we will embark on a new era of promise and potential, continuing to build a Rizia that shines as a beacon of hope, prosperity, and peace."

Player_Romus

"In closing, I offer my deepest gratitude for the privilege of serving as your king. I will continue to serve my duty with the best of my abilities."

Player_Romus

"As I'm nearing my 10th year reign, my commitment to Rizia and its people remains unshaken, bound by a love for our land that is as eternal as the stars under which it rests."

Player_Romus

"Let it be known that my resolve remains unshakeable, and our kingdom invincible under the banner of House Toras."

Narrator

I took a deep breath.

Player_Romus

"God bless you all."

Player_Romus

"Long live the Wruhecist Kingdom!"

Player_Romus

"Long live the Holy Theocracy of Rizia!"

Narrator

I took a deep breath.

Player_Romus

"Together, we are invincible. Together, we are Rizia. Long live Rizia."

Player_Romus

"From the Gulf of Moridia to Sudis, and across to the Antacean Sea, Rizia stands united and stronger than ever."

Player_Romus

"Long live Rizia, a beacon of democracy and a testament to the enduring spirit of its people."

Player_Romus

"Thank you."

Narrator

I nodded at the camera crew. They stopped filming.

Narrator

I nodded at the camera crew. They stopped filming.

Narrator

My 10th year was almost over.

Player_Romus

"Until my heir {RiziaDLCText.KingsSon} comes of age, I place the kingdom in his mother Lucita Azaro's capable hands."

Player_Romus

"As your rightful king {RiziaDLCText.KingsSon} is still yet to be born, and in the absence of any closer living Toras relatives, my third cousin shall be your interim monarch."

Player_Romus

"Long live Rizia, and may the reign of Queen Lucita usher in a new dawn of glory and achievement for our cherished kingdom."
